Field: {"WORDS": [1, [10, "Finally, after 20 years, I"ve found it. The fabled BOOK OF OPALESCENCE."]]}
{"WORDS": [1, [10, "Thank you for freeing me from this book, friend. Opalescence banished me to this wretched tome and-"]]}
{"WORDS": [1, [10, "YOU FOOL. YOU HAVE NOT DESTROYED ME, YOU HAVE ONLY FREED ME FROM THE BOOK. YOU SHALL NOW TAKE MY PLACE IN THE BOOK."]]}
{"WORDS": [1, [10, "No, please don"t do this! Opal Bloom, NO!"]]}
